attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
From all uk Motorcyclists and motorcycle dealers,Motorcycle instructers etc etc
To stop any more absurd petition being created by this person named above.
How are paramedics,police and despatch riders with important documents supposed to carry out emergency attendance through the traffic logged roads of the uk without motorcycles?
How about training ALL car drivers to take better observation when driving.
Maybe when your next stuck in traffic and see motorcycles still making safe progress instead of thinking "danger" think what it would be like if you could ride a motorcycle in a safe curtious way like 99% of the motorcycle riders on the road and how much safer it would be if car drivers HAD to learn how to react or take caution before pulling out in front of a motorcycle.
Less polution than most cars,less wear on the roads,less parking space needed.
Bet he drives a chelsea tractor

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
